dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, seriously? Another one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, seriously? Another one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: What do you mean "another one"? Like, people felt that, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What do you mean another one? Like, people felt that, A.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, a five point oh. In Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, a five point oh. In Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre, the tremors, measuring 5.0 magnitude, were registered at 3:56 PM Astana time

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: What's the big deal? What's the big deal? Uh, did you even read the whole thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What's the big deal? What's the big deal? Uh, did you even read the whole thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: It says Taraz residents felt it, you know? Taraz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says Taraz residents felt it, you know? Taraz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Social media reports indicate that residents of Taraz felt the earthquake.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay. Twenty kilometers southwest of, uh, Merke. It's not exactly a major city center.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay. Twenty kilometers southwest of, uh, Merke. It's not exactly a major city center.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the tremors... were registered... 20 kilometers southwest of the village of Merke in the Zhambyl region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but it was 3:56 PM, right? People are out and about, they're noticing this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but it was three fifty six p m, right? People are out and about, they're noticing this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the tremors... were registered at 3:56 PM Astana time

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it was a five. That's not, like, devastating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it was a five. That's not, like, devastating.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Not devastating? Um, hello, they had another one just last month, remember? March 28th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not devastating? Um, hello, they had another one just last month, remember? March twenty eighth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is worth noting that another earthquake was recorded earlier, on the night of March 28, in several districts of the Zhambyl region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the one where Merke was, what, five points? And Taraz was like, two points? Barely a tremor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the one where Merke was, what, five points? And Taraz was like, two points? Barely a tremor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The highest intensity of 5 points was registered in the village of Merke in the Merke district. ... the cities of Taraz, Shu, and Kordai, as well as the Moyinkum district, felt weaker tremors of 2 points.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Barely a tremor? For some, yes, but for Merke, that's significant. Two quakes in, what, a month?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Barely a tremor? For some, yes, but for Merke, that's significant. Two quakes in, what, a month?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just... a five point oh. It's not like the ground opened up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just... a five point oh. It's not like the ground opened up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, this time. But a pattern, A, a pattern is forming. You don't think that's concerning?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, this time. But a pattern, A, a pattern is forming. You don't think that's concerning?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: No, I think it's, uh, pretty normal seismic activity for that region. Honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I think it's, uh, pretty normal seismic activity for that region. Honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Normal? So you're saying people feeling the ground shake is "normal"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Normal? So you're saying people feeling the ground shake is normal?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, like, uh, for an earthquake zone? Yeah.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, like, uh, for an earthquake zone? Yeah.
